mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id as userId,a.nick_name as nickName,a.phone as phone,a.credit_score as creditScore, b.status as confirmStatus,c.school_name as schoolName FROM sys_user_info a LEFT JOIN sys_order_confirm b ON b.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN school c ON a.school_id = c.school_id where b.order_id = #{id}
